name: openapi-boilerplate
description: Multi-file boilerplate for Open API Specification.

scripts.lint: npm run bundle && npx @stoplight/spectral lint build/openapi.yaml
scripts.preview: npm run bundle && npx redoc-cli serve build/openapi.yaml --options.onlyRequiredInSamples
scripts.html: npm run bundle && npx redoc-cli bundle build/openapi.yaml  --output build/index.html --options.onlyRequiredInSamples
